<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scorching Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=2561) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You make a weapon unbearable to hold. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a target creature. You don't need to have a hand free to make this Disarm attempt. If the Disarm attempt succeeds, the target takes 4d6 fire damage unless it drops the weapon, and on a critical success, it takes 4d6 fire damage and drops the weapon. If you're legendary in Athletics, this increases to 8d6 fire damage.
name: Scorching Disarm
